casebody.data:
RELIANCE INSURANCE CO., Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Ted O. ROMINE, Defendant-Appellant. No. 89-8224

Non-Argument Calendar.

United States Court of Appeals, Eleventh Circuit. Nov. 22, 1989. James P. Gerard, Savannah, Ga., for defendant-appellant. Charles H. Fails, M. Michael Egan, Jr., Atlanta, Ga., for plaintiff-appellee. Before HATCHETT and COX Circuit Judges, and HILL, Senior Circuit Judge. PER CURIAM:

We affirm on the basis of the district court’s opinion in Reliance Insurance Co. v. Romine, 707 F.Supp. 550 (S.D.Ga.1989).

AFFIRMED.
